= id( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments match (or partially match) an item's !ArkInventory ID

== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N = numeric or string

== Remarks ==

  * the complete item id can be found on the debug info menu

  * partial matches can made

  * if argument is numeric it will only match on item id itself

  * use a string to specify suffix, enchants and gems

  * does not work on spells (pets and mounts)

== Examples ==

`id( 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 )`

`id( 1, "23:0:0" )`

`id( "12:1:0:0:0:3", 54 )`
